main event: A bright, saucer-shaped UFO was observed near Pontiac, Michigan on August 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter and 10-15 feet thick.
The object was observed to be moving rapidly and flying 1/2 degree above the horizon.
The object was described as 'saucer-shaped' and 'illuminated' several times.
The duration of the sighting was approximately 20-40 minutes.
The sighting was reported to the Air Defense Command by an unknown Air Patrol affiliate.
